title: Previous sales
body: Just wondering does anyone know of a way to see what sales have pasted already, I know you can check the sale schedule for the month but is there a similar one which shows what champions/skins have been on sale. Only wondering because I want to buy a champ soon that's on sale this month (December 2015) but I don't know if they've been on sale yet.

replies.body: [This](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/League_of_Legends_Wiki/Sale) shows the weeks current sale rotation, as well as the next one.
